text: "Treat Me Right" is a 1980 song by Pat Benatar and is the third and final single from her second studio album Crimes of Passion. It went to number 18 in the United States and number 12 in Canada. It was used in the 1982 movie An Officer and a Gentleman. == References == Category:1980 songs Category:Pat Benatar songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Treat Me Right (Pat Benatar song)
